summary: Friends experience the ups and downs of college life.

reviews.content: Excellent story, well written, directed and acted. Touches one's heart and conveys a critical message many can learn from.
Hilarious, heart-warming and heart-breaking at the same time.

The story is not so simple — a bunch of engineering students and their journey from being losers to choosers. No that's the cover. Its other important purpose is hidden underneath it. The students, especially the iit aspirants and they connect with this movie.
Sushant and his batchmates show us an ode to college-time friendships, romances, ragging, fights, competitions and countless memories. Enough to take you on a nostalgic cycle. But was this recollection for? It was for his 'failed son'? was it not? had he really failed? was his hardwork and effort all in vain?
This is where this movie subtly hits and hits fiercely. It shows that effort and hardwork always pays, maybe not always the winner, but a loser either. This may seem common sense to you. but India had a student population of 3.74 crores in higher education in FY2019. And 22 lakhs students applied for JEE for 12,000 seats in IIT's in 2022. See the cruel ratio? which one of the 22 lakh students have not made effort for getting into JEE? how many parents emptied there savings to get their child best coaching?
The rest after the 12,000 selected, what about them? are they destined to be 'failures'? well No, there are countless success stories out of IIT's.
But the applicants dont know it, they are vey much crushed under the pressure. This films motivates them, tells them it's not the end and your efforts weren't in vain.
Thank you Sushant Singh Rajput. RIP.

Vo din bhi ky din th. 
Khriyat pucho kabhi to kheriyat pucho . 
SHUSHANT sir briliant .
No One Can Forgot This Movie Because This Is A Complete Masterpiece 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
It is for me the best hindi movie in year 2019.. lovely story and powerful acting by all actors
Never seen such type of movie with a new message it makes us laugh then cry then teach us a lesson that life is more important than any win or lose.

Chhichhore is one of those rare movies that delivers messages on multiple dimensions. The importance of trying not winning. The overburdened expectations on children. The power of friendship in adversity and challenge. Besides one of the last great performances of the dearly missed SSR. Fantastic movie, you can conquer anything if you conquer self doubt.
